articles.title: For Google India, A Question From Supreme Court - NDTV
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Monday asked Google India, locked in a legal battle over a hefty Rs 1,337 crore penalty, if it will follow the same regime in India as it does in Europe with regard to pre-installed apps in Android-based mobile smartphones.
articles.content: New Delhi: The Supreme Court on Monday asked Google India, locked in a legal battle over a hefty Rs 1,337 crore penalty, if it will follow the same regime in India as it does in Europe with regard to… [+2098 chars]

articles.title: Royals gather for funeral of Greece's last king Constantine - News24
articles.description: The funeral of Greece's last king, Constantine II, will take place on Monday with a host of European royalty expected to descend on Athens for the service.
articles.content: <ul><li>The entire Spanish royal family, Denmark's Queen Margrethe II and Crown Prince Frederik, Monaco's Prince Albert II and Princess Anne of the British royal family will attend the funeral of Gre… [+4208 chars]
